what: R package to access data from NREL (National Renewable Energy Lab)
title: R package to access data from NREL (National Renewable Energy Lab)
text: R package access data National Renewable Energy Lab (NREL) developer network.   goal nrel.dev.api provide R-native access NREL’s renewable energy sources data-sets using NREL Developer Network API.

title: R package to access data from NREL (National Renewable Energy Lab)
text: can install development version nrel.dev.api GitHub :

title: R package to access data from NREL (National Renewable Energy Lab)
text: Register https://developer.nrel.gov/ get API key email address.
code: library(nrel.dev.api)  # to save your credentials (do once) set_nrel_api_key(nrel.api.email = "YOUR_EMAIL", nrel.api.key = "YOUR_NREL_API_KEY") # to retrieve x <- get_nrel_api_email() x get_nrel_api_key(invisible = FALSE) # get url address by the dataset name get_nrel_url("india-wind")  # fetch/download the data x <- fetch_nrel_data(   lon = 75.36621, lat = 24.72687,   api_url = get_nrel_url("india-wind"),   attributes = "windspeed_40m,windspeed_80m,windspeed_100m,windspeed_120m",   interval = 15,   names = "2014") x
